home.headline: Los Alcázares - Your Perfect Holiday Destination on the Costa Cálida

descriptions.1: Los Alcázares, the coveted coastal resort on Spain's Costa Cálida in the Murcia region, enchants visitors with its unique location on the Mar Menor, Europe's largest saltwater lagoon. The charming coastal town offers ideal conditions for families with children and water sports enthusiasts with its calm, shallow water.
descriptions.2: With 7 kilometers of coastline and year-round average temperatures of 20°C, Los Alcázares is the ideal place to enjoy sun and sea all year round. The convenient location makes travel easy:
descriptions.3/headline: Health and Wellness at Mar Menor
descriptions.3: The therapeutic saltwater of the Mar Menor turns every beach holiday into a natural spa experience. The iodine-rich saltwater has:
descriptions.4: Los Alcázares offers crystal-clear water and white sandy beaches - perfect for:
descriptions.5: The modern sports center complements the offer with basketball, football, tennis, volleyball and fitness courses.
descriptions.6: Los Alcázares has a complete tourist infrastructure:
descriptions.6/5: 15 golf courses in the area, including the famous Golf Club La Manga
descriptions.7: The modern sports center complements the offer with basketball, football, tennis, volleyball and fitness courses.
descriptions.8/1: Cartagena - The historic port city of cruise ships with Roman ruins and maritime flair.
descriptions.8/2: Murcia - The regional capital delights with its beautiful old town and cultural attractions.
descriptions.8/3: Mula - Pure relaxation in the famous underground thermal baths.
descriptions.8/4: Calblanque - A nature reserve with dreamlike beaches, hidden caves and crystal-clear water.
descriptions.8/5: La Manga del Mar Menor - The unique spit of land between the saltwater lagoon and the Mediterranean Sea is only 80 meters wide at its narrowest point. Here you can bathe in two different bodies of water in one day!
descriptions.9/headline: Your Dream Holiday in Los Alcázares Awaits
descriptions.9: Los Alcázares combines relaxation, health and activity in perfect harmony. Whether family holiday, water sports adventure or wellness break - discover for yourself why Los Alcázares is one of the most popular travel destinations on the Costa Cálida.

enquiry.headline: Inquiry
enquiry.successMessage: Your inquiry has been sent successfully.
enquiry.errorMessage: Your inquiry could not be sent.

bookIt.cleaning: plus a one-time cleaning fee of {cleaning}

description.1: We, Olaf and Tina, had long dreamed of emigrating to Spain. Olaf is half-Spanish, his mother comes from the Murcia region. We have owned an apartment in Los Urrutias for years. In 2024, we then took the plunge, sold everything in Germany and emigrated completely to Spain. We are self-employed here with a small German service and now want to give others the opportunity to get to know the flair and lifestyle of this area.
description.2: We love this country and want to inspire others about it too. It is important to us that we as landlords are always on site and available as contact persons. The rental is handled by us personally. This means for you as our tenants that we carry out a final inspection (when tenants depart), so that it is ensured that you will not experience any unpleasant surprises upon arrival and the apartment is in perfect condition.

descriptions.1: The protection of your personal data is of particular concern to me. I therefore process your data exclusively on the basis of legal provisions (GDPR, TMG). In this privacy policy, I inform you about which data is collected when visiting this website and how I handle it.
descriptions.2: The data controller for data processing on this website is:
descriptions.3/headline: 3. Collection and Processing of Personal Data
descriptions.3: This website can generally be visited without providing personal data. No cookies are set and no tracking or analysis tools are used.
descriptions.4: If you contact me via the form on the website, the data you provide (e.g., name, email address, message) will be stored by me for the purpose of processing your inquiry and in case of follow-up questions. This data will not be shared without your consent and will not be used for other purposes.
descriptions.5: The processing of data is carried out in accordance with Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. b GDPR (for the performance of a contract or pre-contractual measures).
descriptions.6: The hosting provider of this website may automatically collect and store information in so-called server log files, which your browser automatically transmits. These may include:
descriptions.7: This data cannot be assigned to specific persons. No merging of this data with other data sources is undertaken. The data serves solely for technical monitoring and security of the website.
descriptions.8: You are generally entitled to the following rights:
descriptions.8/3: Deletion of your data (provided there is no legal retention obligation)
descriptions.9: If you believe that the processing of your data violates data protection law, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the competent data protection supervisory authority.
descriptions.10: For questions about the collection, processing or use of your personal data, as well as for information, correction, blocking or deletion of data, please contact: casas.marmenor@gmx.de

empty.headline: Our guestbook is still empty...
empty.text: But it doesn't have to stay that way! We would be very happy if you left the first entry. Whether it's a kind greeting, a nice compliment, or your impression of the visit – your contribution marks the beginning and brings a smile to others as well.

descriptions.1/headline: We look forward to your entry!
descriptions.1: Did you feel comfortable? Would you like to share a special moment with us or simply leave a few kind words? Then please feel free to write us an entry in our guestbook. Your feedback is important to us and brings great joy not only to us, but also to future guests.

metadata.title: Los Alcázares - Your Perfect Holiday Destination on the Costa Cálida
metadata.description: Holiday home & holiday apartment in Los Alcázares (Murcia) with pool. Ideal for beach holidays, relaxation and family holidays on the Spanish coast.
